concept.definition: Known risk of allergy or intolerance reaction upon exposure to the specified substance.
No known risk of allergy or intolerance reaction upon exposure to the specified substance.

description: The risk of an adverse reaction (allergy or intolerance) for this patient upon xposure to the substance (including pharmaceutical products).
name: AllergyIntoleranceSubstanceExposureRisk

text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceSubstanceExposureRisk

The risk of an adverse reaction (allergy or intolerance) for this patient upon xposure to the substance (including pharmaceutical products).

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/allerg-intol-substance-exp-risk defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
known-reaction-risk Known Reaction RiskKnown risk of allergy or intolerance reaction upon exposure to the specified substance.
no-known-reaction-risk No Known Reaction RiskNo known risk of allergy or intolerance reaction upon exposure to the specified substance.
